steps.title: Gather Required Documents
steps.description: You will need citizenship ID, birth certificate, and recent photographs

steps.title: Visit Immigration Office or Apply Online
steps.description: Go to the Immigration Office in Thimphu with all your documents or apply online through www.citizenservices.gov.bt
steps.time_estimate: 30 minutes travel time or immediate online

steps.title: Fill Application Form
steps.description: Complete the passport application form at the office or download it online

steps.title: Submit Application and Pay Fees
steps.description: Submit your completed form with documents and pay the required fees

steps.title: Collect Your Passport
steps.description: Return to collect your passport after the processing period

fees.note: Regular passport application fee is Nu. 1,000. Emergency travel documents available for Nu. 20 USD equivalent.

tips: Keep your receipt safe for collection
Ensure security clearance certificate is valid
